title: Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Mining Too Weak to be Sustainable
text:
Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Mining Too Weak to be Sustainable

Cryptocurrency News 28 minutes ago (Oct 28, 2019 09:01AM ET)

© Reuters. Bitcoin Cash (BCH) Mining Too Weak to be Sustainable When (BCH) split off from in August 2017, it inherited the SHA-256 hashing function. At one point, the two networks looked competitive enough, and miners flowed in from one network to the other. https://twitter.com/pourteaux/status/1188214945218998272 But BCH, with its current hashrate close to 2 EH/s, is no match for Bitcoin’s network, which according to some reports reached 120 EH/s. This also means that there are enough mining rigs available to completely wipe out the... This article appeared first on Cryptovest
